description: Our new collection built to make going bra-free that much smoother. Flattering and comfortable skort ready to wear every day, for every plan. Comes in our stretch-enhanced cotton-blend fabric, featuring a slimming fit, straight neckline, built-in shorts, adjustable straps and a built-in bra with removable pads.

Our new collection built to make bra free that much smoother. Flattering maxi dress in our textured flowy fabric, featuring a babydoll silhouette, v-neckline, adjustable straps, and dainty clasp-back detail - plus a seamed in bra with removable pads.
Slim-fitting maxi dress in our soft sweater yarn fabric, featuring a high neckline with on-trend beaded details down the back, crochet-style stitching details throughout and a sheer skirt.
Flattering midi dress in our shine cotton fabric, featuring a dipped waistline, back smocking, adjustable straps and on-trend bubble hem.

Our new collection built to make bra free that much smoother. Flattering maxi dress in our textured flowy fabric, featuring a babydoll silhouette, v-neckline, adjustable straps, and dainty clasp-back detail - plus a seamed in bra with removable pads!
Comfy sweatshirt in our Soft A&F fabric and oversized-fit silhouette, featuring golf-inspired graphic detail at chest and back, crew neckline and banded hem and cuffs.

Our new collection built to make going bra-free that much smoother. Slim-fitting 90's-style top in our softAF cotton-blend seamless fabric, featuring removable pads for added coverage and a scoop neckline. Our cotton-blend seamless fabric is an ultra soft, brushed jersey fabric, that gives you a casual seamless look!

Slim-fitting bodysuit in our softAF cotton-blend seamless fabric with wide straps, square neckline and two-snap bottom closure. Our cotton-blend seamless fabric is an ultra soft, brushed jersey fabric, that gives you a casual seamless look!

Body-skimming vest in our structured yet stretchy, customer-favorite LuxeLoft sweater yarn fabric, featuring a shorter body length, v-neckline and on-trend hammered gold buttons. Pairs perfect with your favorite pair of jeans!

Body-skimming vest in our structured yet stretchy, customer-favorite LuxeLoft sweater yarn fabric, featuring a shorter body length, v-neckline and on-trend hammered gold buttons. Pairs perfect with your favorite pair of jeans!

Slim-fitting top in our softAF cotton-blend seamless fabric, featuring a halter neckline and straight hem. Our cotton-blend seamless fabric is an ultra soft, brushed jersey fabric, that gives you a casual seamless look!

Body-skimming vest in our structured yet stretchy, customer-favorite LuxeLoft sweater yarn fabric, featuring a shorter body length, v-neckline and on-trend hammered gold buttons. Pairs perfect with your favorite pair of jeans!

Body-skimming vest in our structured yet stretchy, customer-favorite LuxeLoft sweater yarn fabric, featuring a shorter body length, v-neckline and on-trend hammered gold buttons. Pairs perfect with your favorite pair of jeans!

Easy-fitting sweater in our soft sweater yarn fabric and classic silhouette, featuring rib trims along the crew neckline, hem and cuffs and lobster graphic detail at chest. Pairs perfect with your favorite pair of denim bottoms or a skirt!

By choosing our cotton products, you’re supporting A&F Co.’s investment in Better Cotton’s mission: to help cotton communities survive and thrive, while protecting and restoring the environment. This product is sourced via a system of mass balance and therefore may not contain Better Cotton. This means Better Cotton is not physically traceable to final products. However, Better Cotton Farmers are trained on how to use water efficiently, care for soil health and natural habitats, reduce use of the most harmful chemicals and respect workers’ rights and wellbeing. Click to learn more about Better Cotton: https://corporate.abercrombie.com/sustainability/product-sustainability/materials/#cotton"

Our cotton-blend seamless fabric is an ultra soft, brushed jersey fabric, that gives you a casual seamless look!

Our new collection built to make going bra-free that much smoother. Slim-fitting bodysuit in our soft mesh fabric, featuring removable pads for added coverage, a sweetheart neckline, two-snap bottom closure and on-trend bust details.

Slim-fitting top in our double-layered softAF cotton-blend seamless fabric and cropped length, featuring ruching details along the bodice and portrait neckline. Our cotton-blend seamless fabric is an ultra soft, brushed jersey fabric, that gives you a casual seamless look!
Our new denim vest in a long length, featuring a flyaway front, button-up front and seaming details along the bodice.

Our new collection built to make going bra-free that much smoother. Slim-fitting 90's-style top in our softAF cotton-blend seamless fabric, featuring removable pads for added coverage and a scoop neckline. Our cotton-blend seamless fabric is an ultra soft, brushed jersey fabric, that gives you a casual seamless look!
Wide leg pants in a breezy linen-blend fabric. Features a pull-on style elasticated waistband with a drawcord detail for an adjustable rise.

Our signature A&F Sloane Tailored Pant in an everyday menswear fabric, that's perfect for dressing up or down. The Sloane Tailored Pant is an ultra-high rise tailored wide leg pant with figure-flattering pleating details, a functional fly and pockets and a partially elasticated waistband for ultimate adjustability. The intended length hits the bottom of a flat shoe. Please reference our size chart to determine your perfect size and inseam!

Our signature A&F Sloane Tailored Pant in an everyday menswear fabric, that's perfect for dressing up or down. The Sloane Tailored Pant is an ultra-high rise tailored wide leg pant with figure-flattering pleating details, a functional fly and pockets and a partially elasticated waistband for ultimate adjustability. The viral fit that eliminates waist gap: Curve Love features additional room through the hip and thigh for curve-hugging comfort. The intended length hits the bottom of a flat shoe. Please reference our size chart to determine your perfect size and inseam!
High rise with a relaxed fit throughout the hip and thigh, and a 5 inch (13 cm) inseam. Vintage stretch denim in a medium wash, with frayed hem.

High rise with a relaxed fit throughout the hip and thigh, and a 5 inch (13 cm) inseam. The viral fit that eliminates waist gap: Curve Love features additional room through the hip and thigh for curve-hugging comfort. Vintage stretch denim in a medium wash, with frayed hem.
High rise early 2000's-inspired denim with a loose fit throughout the leg, and a 6 inch (15 cm) inseam. Vintage stretch denim in a light medium wash, with frayed hem.

High rise early 2000's-inspired denim with a loose fit throughout the leg, and a 6 inch (15 cm) inseam. The viral fit that eliminates waist gap: Curve Love features additional room through the hip and thigh for curve-hugging comfort. Vintage stretch denim in a light medium wash, with frayed hem.

Our classic relaxed jeans in a medium wash with a clean hem. This fit features a 10.5” high rise, is fitted at the waist and hips, and eases at the thigh into a relaxed, full-length leg shape. This jean is made from our vintage stretch fabric which features both an authentic vintage look and contains slight built-in stretch for additional comfort.

Our Curve Love relaxed jeans in a medium wash with a clean hem. This fit features a 10.5” high rise, is fitted at the waist and hips, and eases at the thigh into a relaxed, full-length leg shape. The viral fit that eliminates waist gap: Curve Love features additional room through the hip and thigh for curve-hugging comfort. This jean is made from our vintage stretch fabric which features both an authentic vintage look and contains slight built-in stretch for additional comfort.

High rise pant in our everyday menswear fabric and straight-leg silhouette, that has a slightly slimmer leg shape than our Sloane pant. Features a clean fixed waistband, figure-flattering pleat detail, pockets and a functional zipper.

On-trend single-breasted blazer in our menswear suiting fabric, featuring interior pocket, sleeve buttons, side pockets and center-button closure. This blazer features a straight-cut silhouette, size down for a slimmer fit!
New and improved fit of our classic denim trucker jacket, with an oversized-fit silhouette, distressed details, a button-up front and pockets throughout.

Our new mid-length trench coat in our wind- and water-resistant fabric and classic-fit silhouette, featuring lightweight interior lining, double-breasted collar, side pockets and adjustable tie at waist.
On-trend single-breasted blazer in a soft vegan leather fabric and classic-fit silhouette, featuring side pockets and center-button closure.

Our new on-trend barn jacket in a lightweight twill fabric, featuring a vegan leather collar detail, front pockets and a button-up front. This jacket features an easier fit, size down for a closer fit!
Easy-fitting sleep cami in our lightweight, silky soft fabric, featuring a sheer overlay, v-neckline, adjustable tie detail, adjustable cami straps and elastic in the back for the perfect fit.
Easy-fitting sleep shorts in our lightweight, silky soft fabric, featuring a sheer overlay, an elasticated waistband with adjustable drawstring for ultimate comfort and fit and pockets.
Slim-fitting long-sleeve henley top in our soft cozy lounge fabric and oversized-fit silhouette, featuring a button-up neckline and all-over textured detail.
Slim-fitting long-sleeve tee in our soft cozy lounge knit fabric and tuckable length, featuring on-trend slash neckline and all-over texture detail.
Slim-fitting short-sleeve henley top in our soft cozy lounge fabric and tuckable length, featuring a button-up neckline and all-over textured detail.
Our new thong sandals featuring wide straps with a comfortable rubber sole. Perfect to dress up or down!
Our new thong sandals featuring wide straps with a comfortable rubber sole. Perfect to dress up or down!
Our new thong slide sandals in a soft vegan leather fabric, with a slight kitten heel and embossed logo detail. Perfect to dress up or down!
Our new slide sandals in a canvas fabric, featuring a flattering knot detail across the foot and a vegan leather heelbed for added comfort. Perfect to dress up or down!
Our new ballet-inspired flats in a soft mesh fabric, with on-trend slingback detail and a plush footbed.

Our new slim-fitting sports bra in our studioFLEX active fabric. Our studioFLEX fabric is lightweight, buttery soft and nonrestrictive providing a barely there feel, it moves with you during low impact activity and is also great for all-day wear. Features on-trend double-layer detail and removable pads.

Slim-fitting active tank in our comfortable sculptLUX active fabric. Designed to hold you in, our sculptLUX fabric is compressive and supportive without being restrictive, as well as smoothing and sculpting without pinching. Features our core length, square neckline and interior lining with removable pads.

Our high rise 3" active skirt in our lightweight sculptLUX active fabric. Features a shorts lining underneath that's super soft and smooth without being restrictive. Designed to hold you in, our sculptLUX fabric is soft, sculpting and flattering. This 2-in-1 skort features a tall elasticated waistband, asymmetrical wrap-front detail and hidden side pockets on interior liner.

Slim-fitting active tank in our comfortable sculptLUX active fabric. Designed to hold you in, our sculptLUX fabric is compressive and supportive without being restrictive, as well as smoothing and sculpting without pinching. Features our core length, square neckline and interior lining with removable pads.

Our high rise active skirt in our lightweight sculptLUX active fabric. Features a 3" shorts lining underneath that's super soft and smooth without being restrictive. Designed to hold you in, our sculptLUX fabric is soft, sculpting and flattering. This 2-in-1 skort features an elasticated waistband, side-notch detail and hidden side pockets on interior liner.

Classic 6 inch (15 cm) shorts in our softAF fleece fabric and relaxed-fit silhouette, with a thicker waistband for added comfort, exterior drawcords, side pockets and a beveled back pocket for extra storage.

Features carpenter-style details like a hammer loop, wider belt loops, button and fly closure and back patch pockets. Our athletic fit gives more room through the thigh and seat, featuring added stretch for comfort.

Our new 7 inch (18 cm) plainfront shorts in a stretchy, breathable fabric. Features quick-dry and wrinkle-release properties, pockets throughout, belt loops and button fly closure.

Our workwear pants in a stretchy canvas fabric and baggy fit through the leg, for an on-trend look. Features carpenter-style details like a hammer loop, wider belt loops, button and fly closure and back patch pockets. Features a longer inseam designed to puddle around the shoe. For a shorter visual, choose a shorter inseam.

Our new active tank in our comfortable powerSOFT fabric, that's designed for any lifting workout, with 4-way stretch, moisture-wicking and anti-odor properties. Designed with quick-dry comfort, our powerSOFT fabric is stretchy, breathable and subtly textured. Features YPB graphic logo detail at back, shoulder seaming details for extra mobility and a flattering look, crew neckline and straight hem for extra length when lifting overhead.

Our sweatWIK fabric is designed with quick-dry comfort for high-intensity workouts. Features shoulder seaming details for extra mobility and a flattering look and crew neckline.
